text_block_list.text:
As I passed by the arcade, I saw 
vodka playing a game.

text_block_list.name: arcade game
text_block_list.text:
(Dadadaa! Bagoooooooh!) 
KO! 1P, WIN!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Shit! We won again!

text_block_list.name: gradeschooler
text_block_list.text: Ugh…

Perhaps because she was really 
frustrated, her opponent, the 
grade Academyer, bit her lip hard.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm sure she'll give up if 
we make this much money…

text_block_list.name: arcade game
text_block_list.text: New Challenger!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Wow… You've got some guts.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …I like it. I'll treat you coolly!

text_block_list.name: arcade game
text_block_list.text: (*bang* *bang* *bang*) KO! 2P, WIN!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
You got me! You got me! I lost to 
your unyielding heart!

text_block_list.name: gradeschooler
text_block_list.text: Did you… lose on purpose?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? You're admitting your guts…

text_block_list.name: gradeschooler
text_block_list.text: Ugh… Don't make fun of me!
(D-D-D-D-Dad…!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey! Where are you going?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm not making fun of 
you… I'm not… But…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Dammit……what am I doing……!?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I don't think she wanted us to 
give up the win, no matter how 
badly we lost.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
The frustration of losing 
is what's left of you if 
you don't beat your opponent 
at full strength!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
There's no point unless you win 
with your own strength!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Found you! Found you!

text_block_list.name: gradeschooler
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan…?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm really sorry about 
earlier! Sorry!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I trampled on your desire to win!

text_block_list.name: gradeschooler
text_block_list.text:
…No, I should be the one 
apologizing for trying so hard…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
What are you saying?! You're the 
coolest guy I've ever met!

text_block_list.name: gradeschooler
text_block_list.text: Sis…!

text_block_list.name: gradeschooler
text_block_list.text:
I wanna play another round with 
Onee-chan! Next time, I'll beat 
the real one!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll make you say 'I give 
up', so brace yourself!

text_block_list.name: gradeschooler
text_block_list.text: You better be prepared!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I said it! Heheh!!
